description.#cdata-section: BART is recovering from an earlier problem. There is a 10-minute delay on the San Francisco Line in the SFO, Millbrae and East Bay directions due to earlier police activity at Montgomery Street Station.

sms_text.#cdata-section: BART recovering: 10 min delay on SF line in SFO, MLBR and East Bay dirs due to police activity at MONT stn.
